amendment.description: To clarify the availability of certain Construction, Major Projects, funds for the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3774 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3774 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S3786; text: CR S3786) To clarify the availability of certain Construction, Major Projects, funds for the Department of Veterans Affairs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3774 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3774 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Hutchison.
